problem_names:
lemma var_swap_ref1: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

lemma var_swap_ref2: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil> 
   \<supseteq> (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

lemma var_swap_ref3:  
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

lemma var_swap_ref_var: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')); (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')); (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z''))"
translations:
lemma var_swap_ref1: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')) ;
    rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil>
     \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
    \<subseteq> rel_R
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil>
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>

lemma var_swap_ref2: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil> 
   \<supseteq> (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')) ;
    rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil>
     \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
    \<subseteq> rel_R
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil>
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>

lemma var_swap_ref3:  
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z'')); rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z'')) ;
    rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
     \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
    \<subseteq> rel_R
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = a \<and> s ''x'' = b\<rceil>
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>

lemma var_swap_ref_var: 
  "rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil> \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
   \<supseteq> (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')); (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')); (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z''))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')) ; (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')) ;
    (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z''))
    \<subseteq> rel_R
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil>
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>

proof (prove)
using this:
  (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')) ;
  rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = ?a \<and> s ''y'' = ?b\<rceil>
   \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  \<subseteq> rel_R
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?a \<and> s ''y'' = ?b\<rceil>
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')) ;
  rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = ?a \<and> s ''x'' = ?b\<rceil>
   \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  \<subseteq> rel_R
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = ?a \<and> s ''y'' = ?b\<rceil>
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z'')) ;
  rel_R \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
   \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  \<subseteq> rel_R
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''z'' = ?a \<and> s ''x'' = ?b\<rceil>
               \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = ?b \<and> s ''y'' = ?a\<rceil>
  Id \<subseteq> rel_R ?p ?p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (''z'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''x'')) ; (''x'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''y'')) ;
    (''y'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''z''))
    \<subseteq> rel_R
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = a \<and> s ''y'' = b\<rceil>
                 \<lceil>\<lambda>s. s ''x'' = b \<and> s ''y'' = a\<rceil>
